definitions.definition: A unit of time of one twenty-fourth of a day (sixty minutes ).
examples: I spent an hour at lunch.
The hour grows late and I must go home.

definitions.definition: Used after a two-digit hour and a two-digit minute to indicate time.
The amount of labor demanded by an employer in terms of time.
examples: I asked my manager for more hours .
The shop wasn't giving  me enough hours so I started searching for a second job.

definitions.definition: The set times of prayer, the canonical hours , the offices or services prescribed for these, or a book containing them.
A distance that can be traveled in one hour.
examples: This place is an hour away from where I live.

main_definition: ( time ) A unit of time of one twenty-fourth of a day (sixty minutes ).
secondary_definitions: ( military , in the plural ) Used after a two-digit hour and a two-digit minute to indicate time.
( chiefly in the plural ) The amount of labor demanded by an employer in terms of time.
( Christianity , in the plural ) The set times of prayer, the canonical hours , the offices or services prescribed for these, or a book containing them.
( chiefly US ) A distance that can be traveled in one hour.
